RACE.RACE_TEXT: DELTA DOWNS RACE 1 5F Dirt CR: 92. Claiming Purse 19000. FOR FOUR YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD. Weight, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since December 5 Allowed 3 lbs. A Race Since November 5 Allowed 6 lbs. Claiming Price $7,500 (Claiming Races For $5,000 Or Less Not Considered In Estimating Allowances). Louisiana Bred Claiming Price $10,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: HULEN sprinted to a clear lead to set all of the pace, pulled away into the stretch and held late. GALAXY BUILDER dueled in the second flight, made a two wide bid at the quarter pole but was no match for the winner. KING OF THE COURT raced near the back early then moved three wide at the five sixteenths pole to close late but was not enough. SMOOTH COLLIERY dueled in the second flight from the inside, weakened in upper stretch and passed tiring rival. TAPIZARS SECRET rushed up to be placed off the pace through the turn and tired. B W P SPECIAL had lack of speed and was not a threat, bled and was vanned off.

ENTRY.NAME: B W P Special
ENTRY.COMMENT: lack of speed, no threat, bled, vanned off

ENTRY.NAME: Hulen
ENTRY.COMMENT: sprint to lead, pulled away, held late

ENTRY.NAME: King of the Court
ENTRY.COMMENT: near back, 3w5/16p, closed late, not enough

ENTRY.NAME: Smooth Colliery
ENTRY.COMMENT: dueled 2nd flight, weakened, passed tiring rival,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: DELTA DOWNS RACE 2 6 1/2F Dirt CR: 75. Claiming Purse 16000. FOR ACCREDITED LA BRED FOUR YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON FOUR RACES. Weight, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since December 5 Allowed 3 lbs. A Race Since November 5 Allowed 6 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000 (Claiming Races For $4,000 Or Less Not Co nsidered In Estimating Allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: DRAFT CHOICE was hustled from the gate then went five wide into the first turn, vied for the lead to the five sixteenths pole when he took the lead and pulled away and proved best. HIGH RIDGE was forwardly placed around the first turn then made a rail bid on the backstretch, moved out to two wide at the three sixteenths pole and was gaining on the leader but couldn't catch. SWEET RACHEL was placed off the pace on the inside through the final turn then moved out to three wide at the eighth pole and proved best of the rest. SHANGHAI RONNIE was unhurried around the first turn then made a rail bid on the backstretch and improved position. ROCK ON COWBOY raced in the middle of the pack from the three path moved out to four wide bid on the backstretch, was three wide into the upper stretch and passed tiring rival. FLUFFPOINT went to the early pressured lead from the inside to the five sixteenths pole then vied for the lead to the quarter pole and weakened. GRAND PRIORITY was restless in the gate, raced near the back around the first turn then made a four wide bid on the backstretch and flattened out. KING MARVIN went three wide around the first turn then moved up on the backstretch and gave way. CUSTOMIZE MY QUEST was unsettled in the gate, saved ground through out but was not a threat.

ENTRY.NAME: Customize My Quest
ENTRY.COMMENT: unsettled gate, saved ground, no threat,

ENTRY.NAME: Rock On Cowboy
ENTRY.COMMENT: middle of pack 3p, 4wbid, 3wuppr, passed tiring rival

ENTRY.NAME: Sweet Rachel
ENTRY.COMMENT: off pace, inside, 3w1/8p, best of rest

ENTRY.NAME: Fluffpoint
ENTRY.OWNER: 5G Farms LLC and McBride Thoroughbreds LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: early lead, inside, vied for lead, weakened,

ENTRY.NAME: Grand Priority
ENTRY.OWNER: Batiste Lionel Jr and Hebert Brandon
ENTRY.COMMENT: restless gate, near back, 4wbid, flattened out

ENTRY.NAME: Draft Choice
ENTRY.COMMENT: hustled along, 5w1st, vied for lead, led 5/16p, pull away, best

RACE.RACE_TEXT: DELTA DOWNS RACE 3 5F Dirt CR: 72. Maiden Special Weight Purse 40000. FOR ACCREDITED LA BRED MAIDENS, THREE YEARS OLD. Weight, 120 lbs. (Preference To Horses That Have Not Started For Less Than $20,000 In Their Last Three Starts).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: EMPIRE KID sprinted to the lead and was kept to task in the drive. SUIT OF WANDS stalked the leaders from the three path, made a late run in the stretch to be second best. CREEKSIDE broke in at the start then tracked the leaders from the inside, made a rail bid in the stretch to be just up for the show. STEAUXLIT chased the leader from the two path and weakened. EL IT saved ground through the turn then moved out to three wide in upper stretch and finished evenly. ONE MORE SLEEP was void of speed and not a threat. WAR SABER hopped at the start then was hustled along from three wide but was not a factor. DIXIELAND STORMING broke in at the start and was always back.

ENTRY.NAME: Creekside
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke in, tracked leaders, rail bid, up show

ENTRY.NAME: Suit of Wands
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, 3w, late run, second best,

ENTRY.NAME: Empire Kid
ENTRY.COMMENT: sprint to lead, kept to task

ENTRY.NAME: War Saber
ENTRY.COMMENT: hopped start, hustled along 3w, no factor,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: DELTA DOWNS RACE 4 6 1/2F Dirt CR: 63. Claiming Purse 12000. FOR FOUR YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Weight, 123 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: MR LIBERTY went to the lead from the inside to set all the pace and held on late. CLEVER PRINCE tracked the leaders from the inside, made a rail bid on the final turn then moved out to the two path in mid stretch but couldn't catch the winner and proved second best. CONFESS stalked the pace from the two path then move out to three wide at the five sixteenth pole and fought gamely in the stretch. MICHAEL'S BAD BOY settled in the middle of the pack then made a rail bid at the three eighths pole, moved out to three wide at the three sixteenths pole and flattened out. CAPTAINS COVE lugged out on the first turn and lost action then settled near the back into the backstretch moved up going three wide in the final turn and improved position. DOUBLE BOGEY was forwardly placed on the inside but was through after a half. CROOKS REBEL was four wide into the first turn, raced near the back down the backstretch and passed tiring rival in the stretch. BARNEY'S PASSION raced in the middle of the pack from the two path and retreated. SASSI ASPEN went five wide into the first turn, raced widest of all and was not a factor. MARKETBOOK settled in the middle of the pack from the three path but was not a threat.

ENTRY.NAME: Michael's Bad Boy
ENTRY.COMMENT: middle of pack, rail bid, 3w3/16p, flattened out

ENTRY.NAME: Clever Prince
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked leaders, rail bid, moved out, second best,

ENTRY.NAME: Mr Liberty
ENTRY.OWNER: Nirvana Farm LLC and Minten Craig

ENTRY.NAME: Captains Cove
ENTRY.COMMENT: lugged out, lost action, 3wbid, improved position

RACE.RACE_TEXT: DELTA DOWNS RACE 5 7 1/2F Dirt CR: 65. Maiden Special Weight Purse 40000. FOR ACCREDITED LA BRED MAIDENS, FOUR YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Weight, 123 lbs. (Preference To Horses That Have Not Started For Less Than $20,000 In Their Last Three Starts).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: KING OF CONTRABAND stalked the pace through the first turn and down the backstretch then took the lead at the quarter pole and drew clear. PRINCE PERFECTA pressed the pace from the two path to the final turn then dueled outside of IRON N STEEL around the final turn, out kicked that one and proved second best. IRON N STEEL went to a pressured lead from the inside to the quarter pole then dueled inside of PRINCE PERFECTA around the final turn, fought gamely to the sixteenths pole and tired. RUN ON ACES was allowed to settle in the two path down the backstretch then made a mild bid on the final turn to improve position. DOUBLE ON THE RED saved ground through out and passed tiring rivals. LOVE OURS was unhurried to the first turn then moved up around the first turn and down the backstretch and faltered. CASH HOLIDAY raced in the middle of the pack then made a three wide bid at the five sixteenths pole and gave way.

ENTRY.NAME: Cash Holiday
ENTRY.OWNER: Sebastian J Ronald and Sebastian Linda P

ENTRY.NAME: Prince Perfecta
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, dueled, out kicked, second best,

ENTRY.NAME: Run On Aces
ENTRY.COMMENT: allowed to settle, mild bid, improved

RACE.RACE_TEXT: DELTA DOWNS RACE 6 5F Dirt CR: 85. Allowance Purse 36000. FOR FOUR YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Weight, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since December 5 Allowed 3 lbs. A Race Since November 5 Allowed 6 lbs. (Claiming Races Not Considered In Estimating Allowances) (Condition Eligibility P referred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: ROYAL CONSORT went to the lead to lead throughout, pulled away on the turn to prove much the best. MATTS FIRE N ICE tracked the leader but was no match for the winner. DANCIN WITH ANGELS raced near the back early then made a rail bid through the turn and held on for the show. GRUNT was last away, made a three wide bid on the turn to make a late run and passed tiring rival to improve position. RUSH THE COLORS chased the leaders to upper stretch and tired. CARRY THY CROSS was close up early in the first furlong then retreated and was out run.

ENTRY.NAME: Dancin With Angels
ENTRY.COMMENT: near back, rail bid, held show

ENTRY.NAME: Royal Consort
ENTRY.COMMENT: led throughout, pulled away, much the best

RACE.RACE_TEXT: DELTA DOWNS RACE 7 6 1/2F Dirt CR: 88. Starter Optional Claiming Purse 20000. FOR FOUR YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE STARTED FOR A CLAIMING PRICE OF $4,000 OR LESS IN 2021 - 2022 OR CLAIMING PRICE $8,000. Weight, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since December 5 Allowed 3 lbs. A Race Since November 5 Allowed 6 lbs. Claiming Price $ 8,000 (Claiming Races For $4,000 Or Less Not Considered In Estimating Allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: FLASHING ANGELBABY tracked the leaders from off the rail to the final turn, moved out to three wide at the three sixteenths pole and was just up in the final strides. CREEKMORE went to a pressured lead to the final turn then pulled away to take a clear lead but was nailed at the wire. BET AGAIN was allowed to settle to the final turn then move to the two path to move up on the final turn and was a game third. HARDCORE FOLKLORE was unhurried to the final turn then was coaxed at the quarter pole move to three wide at the three sixteenths pole for a late rally but was not enough. LOVETHATCAUSE raced in the middle of the pack down the backstretch then move out to four to five wide on the final turn but lacked a late response. HOT LE ROY saved ground to no avail. PARLAY PETE pressed the pace from the two path around the first turn then led briefly between calls then vied for the lead to the three sixteenths pole and weakened. PLATINUM EQUITY was rushed to contention from three wide and vied for the lead around the first turn and gave way after a half.

ENTRY.NAME: Flashing Angelbaby
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked leaders, off rail, 3w3/16p, up final strides

ENTRY.NAME: Lovethatcause
ENTRY.COMMENT: midddle of pack, 4-5w2nd, lacked late response,

ENTRY.NAME: Bet Again
ENTRY.COMMENT: allowed to settle, moved up, game third

ENTRY.NAME: Platinum Equity
ENTRY.COMMENT: rushed to contention, vied for lead, gave way,

ENTRY.NAME: Parlay Pete
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, led between calls, weakened,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: DELTA DOWNS RACE 8 6 1/2F Dirt CR: 74. Allowance Purse 41000. FOR ACCREDITED LA BRED FOUR YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Weight, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since December 5 Allowed 3 lbs. A Race Since November 5 Allowed 6 lbs. (Claiming Races Not Considered In Estimating Allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: THUNDERTAKESDALEAD broke well and went to a clear lead around the first turn then was pressured on the backstretch but pulled away again and just lasted. CHEERFOR MSHAWISH settled in the middle of the pack around the first turn then moved between horses at the three eighths pole, drifted out in the stretch drive and just missed. HOLIDAY DIAMOND was allowed to settled in the three path around the first turn then was five to six wide at the quarter pole to make a late rally. HEZA SEXY ZONG stalked the pace from the two path to the final turn then moved out to four wide in upper stretch and passed tiring rivals. CABOCHON TREASURE tracked the leader around the first turn then pressed the pace on the backstretch to the quarter pole and tired. JOSAN was forwardly placed while saving ground and faded. CUSTOM BLUE GRASS was unhurried to the final turn then moved out to four wide at the quarter pole and gave way.

ENTRY.NAME: Cheerfor Mshawish
ENTRY.COMMENT: middle of pack, between horses, drifted out, just missed,

ENTRY.NAME: Thundertakesdalead
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke well, led throughout, just lasted,

ENTRY.NAME: Holiday Diamond
ENTRY.OWNER: Sebastien Ronald J and Sebastien Linda P

RACE.RACE_TEXT: DELTA DOWNS RACE 9 5F Dirt CR: 37. Maiden Claiming Purse 10000. FOR MAIDENS, FILLIES AND MARES FOUR YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Weight, 123 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: OUR CLOVER GAL tracked the leader to the quarter pole then took over at the three sixteenths pole and drew clear. A. P. STYLE was forwardly place around the turn and chased the winner home. CHATAIN'S EAGLE raced near the back then made a two wide bid going into the three to be best of the rest. ELLIE'S TOUCH saved ground to the turn then moved up on the rail, angled out to three wide at the sixteenths pole to improve position. TENPINS TEMPEST was off slow and raced near the back but was not a factor. PRIME CHOICE settled in the middle of the pack then made a bid going into the turn and weakened. ATLANTIC BAND remained back. LOT'SA SILVER sprinted to a clear lead and tired. BALTIMORE BABE stalked the pace to the five sixteenths pole and gave way.

ENTRY.NAME: Atlantic Band
ENTRY.OWNER: Gallaway Jr Edward R and Lessley Michael L

ENTRY.NAME: Prime Choice
ENTRY.COMMENT: middle of pack, bid turn, weakened,

ENTRY.NAME: Our Clover Gal
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked leader, took over, drew clear,

ENTRY.NAME: Chatain's Eagle
ENTRY.COMMENT: near back, bid into turn, best of rest

ENTRY.NAME: Tenpins Tempest
ENTRY.COMMENT: off slow, near back, no factor,
